title: The Fried Eggs That Made Me a Better Cook
description:
Referenced in this episode:

  • The Crispy Fried Eggs That Made Me a Better Cook (Food52)
  • Mike's Famous Fried Eggs recipe

Genius-Hunter Extra-Credit:

  • Some more crispy egg-spo: ho bao dan (pocket eggs), kai dow (Thai fried eggs)

What's the recipe you first make in a new home? Tell me all about it at genius@food52.com.
author: podcasts@food52.com (Kristen Miglore)

itunes:title: The Fried Eggs That Made Me a Better Cook
itunes:author: Kristen Miglore
itunes:summary: Part one of a two-part series where Kristen share dishes especially near and dear to her and her family, the ones they spatter up new stoves and ovens with immediately. This is Genius Homecoming.
